detail_desc: Short dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with short puff sleeves that have covered elastication at the hems. Elasticated seam and narrow ties under the bust and a flared skirt with a tier. Unlined.
Knee-length cargo shorts in cotton twill with an elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, and flap leg and back pockets with a concealed hook and loop fastening.
Metal hair clips. Length 4 cm.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop strap over the foot. Linings and insoles in a cotton weave, and patterned soles with a good grip.

Fully lined, halterneck swimsuit with laser-cut scalloped edges. Triangular cups with removable inserts, ties at the top and gathers in the sides for a comfortable fit over the tummy. The swimsuit is made partly from recycled polyamide.
Short, straight-cut dress in soft jersey with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves and pockets in the side seams.
Vest top in soft, printed jersey with an asymmetric hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and jacquard-patterned details. Seamless.
Boxy, rib-knit jumper with a turtle neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides.

Blouse in softly draping satin made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high stand-up collar, covered buttons at the top and long balloon sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Gathers around the neckline and cuffs to create volume and soft draping.
Capri trousers in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slits at the hems.
Boxer briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Long-sleeved shirt with a bow tie and waistcoat in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Waistcoat with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined.
Wide-fitting top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a frill-trimmed V-neck and wrapover top with a concealed press-stud at the front. Elasticated seam at the waist and long sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Fitted, lightweight outdoor jacket in fast-drying thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and extra long sleeves with thumbholes.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in sturdy jersey with a fold-down edge at the top, long sleeves, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Shirt in an airy weave with buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Joggers in soft jersey with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Double-layered sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Padded earmuffs in faux fur with a soft fleece inside and an adjustable headband in shimmering imitation leather.
Hat in a soft rib knit.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a collar and cuffs in lace. The dress has pleats at the top, a concealed zip at the back, long sleeves, a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Biker jacket in imitation suede with quilted shoulders, a tab with a press-stud at the neck and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, long sleeves with sturdy ribbed jersey undersides and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Parka in soft, washed cotton twill with a detachable hood and a zip down the front. Lined.
High-waisted, ankle-length trousers in stretch jersey with concealed elastication at the waist and slim legs.
Wide maxi dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck front and back and narrow tie-top shoulder straps.

Shopper in supple, grained imitation leather with two metal ring handles at the top and an adjustable shoulder strap with metal carabiner hooks at both ends. One inner compartment. The upper section of the shopper can be folded down so the bag can be carried as a shoulder bag. Lined. Size 6.5x30x35 cm.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed press-stud, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and short dolman sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen and visible seams. Slightly wider neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Oversized joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, and elasticated hems. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.

Wide blouse in woven fabric with a narrow V-neck at the front and concealed fastening at the top. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a box pleat at the back and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Metal bangle with a metal orb at each end.

Dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with an integral bodysuit. Dress with a decorative bow at the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and an elasticated seam at the waist. Bodysuit with a concealed press-stud at the top and press-studs at the crotch.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, side support and decorative gathers at the front. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and ties at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Baby Exclusive. Flared blouse in double-weave organic cotton with a rounded collar, buttons down the front and long raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.
Long, thick socks in a jacquard knit with a pile lining.
Fisherman’s hat in cotton with ties (size 0-9M without ties). Lined.
Cardigan in a soft, textured knit with a shawl collar and draped front. No fasteners.
Short skirt in an airy organic cotton weave with broderie anglaise. High waist, a concealed zip in one side and two flounced tiers to the hem. Unlined.
Sunglasses with transparent plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Ballet pumps in leather with a brogue pattern and adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Fabric linings and insoles and smooth soles.
Vest top in ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and shorts in cotton jersey. T-shirt with a motif on the chest. Patterned shorts with an elasticated waist, side pockets and fake fly.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave containing some wool with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and a fastening with two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the front and down one leg, short sleeves and short legs.
Hairbands in soft cotton jersey with a sewn-on bow at the front.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Top in a cotton weave with short cap sleeves and a gathered, elasticated neckline.
Bracelets in various designs. Three of thin metal chains with decorations and one with plastic beads. Adjustable length 16.5-20.5 cm.
Ankle boots in leather with pointed toes, covered heels and a zip in one side. Satin linings and leather insoles. Heel approx. 5.5 cm.
Straight-cut vest top in a viscose weave with a scalloped edge and broderie anglaise at the hem.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey. Racer back with a horizontal strap at the back of the neck and crossover shoulder straps with an open section at the back. Rounded hem. The polyester content of the vest top is partly recycled.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the chest, short sleeves and short slits at the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Playsuit in softly draping satin with a lace-trimmed V-neck front and back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Deep armholes, lace side panels and a seam at the waist with covered elastication and decorative ties at the sides. Short, wide legs. Unlined.
V-neck top in crinkled jersey with smocking at the waist and long, slightly wider sleeves with smocked cuffs.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and smocked back. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

Wide tunic in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a small stand-up collar and loose top-layer collar that covers the shoulders. Buttons down the front, long balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, and a scalloped hem.
Pointelle top in soft cotton jersey with a gentle V-neck, decorative buttons down the front and short sleeves with overlocked hems.
Short, fitted lace dress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, shaped cups and a V-neck at the front. Lined.

V-neck jumpsuit in woven fabric with ties at the neckline, a cut-out section at the front and concealed zip at the back. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a seam at the waist with elastication at the back, and straight, ankle-length legs.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides.
Soft, knitted tube scarf with a brushed finish. Width 55 cm, circumference 150 cm.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Espadrilles with elastic gores in the sides and a braided jute trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Long halterneck dress in woven fabric with a sheen in a narrow cut at the top with pleats at the front. Open section with lace trims at the back, covered buttons at the back of the neck and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Partly lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Weekend bag with a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap, two handles and a zip at the top and three inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 19x38x44 cm.
Waist belt in imitation leather decorated with small metal studs. Large metal buckle. Width approx. 3.5 cm.

Fine-knit hooded top in a soft, marled viscose blend with a print motif, wide ribbing around the hood, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer with a rounded hem at the back.
Top in soft jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and long raglan sleeves that have a gathered seam at the elbows and narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Slim-fit chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Short T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and wide, ribbed trim around the neckline. Loose fit with dropped shoulders, short balloon sleeves with elasticated hems, and discreet pockets in the side seams.
